mapper.update: update PBCRS_REPORT_INSECACCTINF set GUARACCTBSSGMTSEQNO = #{GuarAcctBsSgmtSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GUARACCTBSINFSGMTSEQNO = #{GuarAcctBsInfSgmtSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GUARRLTREPYMTINFSGMTSEQNO = #{GuarRltRepymtInfSgmtSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RLTREPYMTINFSGMTSEQNO = #{RltRepymtInfSgmtSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GUAMOTCLTCTRINFSGMTSEQNO = #{GuaMotCltCtrInfSgmtSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where INSECACCTINFSEQNO = #{InSecAcctInfSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select INSECACCTINFSEQNO, GUARACCTBSSGMTSEQNO, GUARACCTBSINFSGMTSEQNO, GUARRLTREPYMTINFSGMTSEQNO, RLTREPYMTINFSGMTSEQNO, GUAMOTCLTCTRINFSGMTSEQNO from PBCRS_REPORT_INSECACCTINF where INSECACCTINFSEQNO = #{InSecAcctInfSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select INSECACCTINFSEQNO, GUARACCTBSSGMTSEQNO, GUARACCTBSINFSGMTSEQNO, GUARRLTREPYMTINFSGMTSEQNO, RLTREPYMTINFSGMTSEQNO, GUAMOTCLTCTRINFSGMTSEQNO from PBCRS_REPORT_INSECACCTINF
select count(1) from pbcrs_report_GuarAcctBsSgmt info1 left join pbcrs_report_GuarAcctBsInfSgmt info2 on info1.guaracctbssgmtseqno=info2.GuarAcctBsInfSgmtSeqNo

select INSECACCTINFSEQNO, GUARACCTBSSGMTSEQNO, GUARACCTBSINFSGMTSEQNO, GUARRLTREPYMTINFSGMTSEQNO, RLTREPYMTINFSGMTSEQNO, GUAMOTCLTCTRINFSGMTSEQNO from PBCRS_REPORT_INSECACCTINF_MOD where INSECACCTINFSEQNO = #{InSecAcctInfSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.update: update PBCRS_REPORT_INSECACCTINF_MOD set GUARACCTBSSGMTSEQNO = #{GuarAcctBsSgmtSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GUARACCTBSINFSGMTSEQNO = #{GuarAcctBsInfSgmtSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GUARRLTREPYMTINFSGMTSEQNO = #{GuarRltRepymtInfSgmtSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RLTREPYMTINFSGMTSEQNO = #{RltRepymtInfSgmtSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GUAMOTCLTCTRINFSGMTSEQNO = #{GuaMotCltCtrInfSgmtSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where INSECACCTINFSEQNO = #{InSecAcctInfSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select INSECACCTINFSEQNO, GUARACCTBSSGMTSEQNO, GUARACCTBSINFSGMTSEQNO, GUARRLTREPYMTINFSGMTSEQNO, RLTREPYMTINFSGMTSEQNO, GUAMOTCLTCTRINFSGMTSEQNO from PBCRS_REPORT_INSECACCTINF_MOD where GUAMOTCLTCTRINFSGMTSEQNO=#{GuaMotCltCtrSgmtSeqNo}

select INSECACCTINFSEQNO, GUARACCTBSSGMTSEQNO, GUARACCTBSINFSGMTSEQNO, GUARRLTREPYMTINFSGMTSEQNO, RLTREPYMTINFSGMTSEQNO, GUAMOTCLTCTRINFSGMTSEQNO from PBCRS_REPORT_INSECACCTINF where GUAMOTCLTCTRINFSGMTSEQNO=#{GuaMotCltCtrSgmtSeqNo}
